RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the defendants: Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya and six co-defendants

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya: defendant charged with conspiracy and assorted offenses related to an illegal alien smuggling venture, found guilty on all counts, sentenced to 292 months in prison, seeking relief from his sentence under Section 2255, and arguing for relief due to sentencing error
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya and six co-def: individuals jointly accused of conspiracy to conceal, harbor, shield, and transport illegal aliens for commercial advantage
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Adrian Almaguer: affidavit provider and defense counsel for Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya
